Running script for collecting, training, testing¶

run¶

This script loads train and test data

class scripts.load_data.DBManager(db_name, table_name)[source]¶

connect to a database and manage the data

db_name: str
name of a database
table_name: str
name of a table
select(s)[source]¶

select data whose key is “s” from the table

s: str
name of a key (column)
select_all()[source]¶

selects all the columns from the table

scripts.load_data.load_data(db_name, table_name, word_class=['名詞', '動詞'], shuffled=True, filename='data.pkl', use_pkl=True, verbose=False)[source]¶

loads data and parse sentence into words

db_name: str
name of a database to read from/write to
table_name: str
name of a table
word_class: list of str
word classes to extract
shuffled: bool
whether to shuffle data
filename: str
file name of a pkl file to save parsed data
use_pkl: bool
whether to use pickled data
verbose: bool
whether to print debug messages
